About Me !

Let me tell you a few thing...

BIO

I'm an engineering student at the Thies Polytechnic School (E.P.T.) of Senegal in I.T.
I was born in Senegal in 1997 and be single with no child.
My ambition is to revolutionize the world of I.T. and specially the computer security. That's why, I do many researches when I have free time to improve my skills. For me the only essentiel thing is "Practice makes perfect"
